Looking around me:

- Directly to the left (row 8, col 31) is a passenger (l).
- Directly to the right (row 8, col 33) is a lever (b).
- Directly above (row 7, col 32) is a wall (p).
- Directly below (row 9, col 32) is a wall (p).

The logical action is to move left into the position of the passenger, which will allow me to collect a passenger.

``` Action:2 ```
This move should collect a passenger, aligning with my objective to reach the win condition by increasing the passenger count.
